name: Chocobonz
description:
The Game

This is a Chocobonz box, a famous brand of everlasting delicious chocolate candies! Come on, let's see how many Chocobonz you can eat in 100 seconds. Dont' worry, nothing bad will happen to you.

Entirely made in 72h for the #minijam 66.

Soundtrack - Bass by Monplaisir

Controls

Left click to collect / right click to reject;

Software

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphic Design - Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition

PROUDLY MADE IN ITALY BY ZENO BIANCHINI AND  WOLF GAMES
